dict.acceptation: 嘴唇；（杯，壶等的）口，边缘；〈俚〉无理的回答；〈美〉律师；
用嘴唇接触；接吻；〈俚〉轻轻地说，唱；把高尔夫球打到穴边而未进去；

sent.orig: The properties and commercial application of LIP FCC catalyst for more iso-alkanes were described.
sent.trans: 介绍了LIP系列多产异构烷烃催化剂的性能及工业应用情况。

sent.orig: Use the LIP method! Listen, Imitate, Practice!
sent.trans: 使用“LIP”方法：听、模仿、体操练！

sent.orig: Listening and imitating should always go together. Use the LIP method! Listen-Imitate-Practice!
sent.trans: 听和模拟必定要同时做，使用“LIP”办法：听、模拟、操练！

sent.orig: Listening and imitating should always go together. Use the LIP method! Listen-imitate-practice!
sent.trans: 听和模仿一定要同时做，用LIP方法：听、模仿、操练！

sent.orig: Cu2+ shows strong inhibition only to MnP but has no effect on LiP.
sent.trans: Cu2+对LiP活性无影响，而对MnP有强烈的抑制作用。 Fe3+对两者活性的抑制都达到了90%。
